A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Having had a day to reflect on The Last Jedi. I can sadly say I am even more disappointed with it than I was when I walked out fo the cinema. The ridiculous social-political statements\, the determination to pander to modern PC requirements like turning Luke into a miserable git has left me feeling deeply unhappy.
